paper.title: Model To Assessing Financial Performance Of Building Sector Enterprises (Galati County - Romania)
paper.abstract: In this paper is designed a model for assessing financial performance, based on models of bankruptcy risk, for enterprises acting in the building sector from Galati County - Romania. In the private sector, designing and development a model for evaluation financial performance is important for ranking enterprises, by establishing a system of classification in accordance with their financial performance. To choose model variables was used discriminate analysis on 22 variables proposed that separate objectively performant by non-performant enterprises. The model with five variables was tested using the initial sample of enterprises obtaining an average success ratio of 81.82%.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究的是建筑行业企业的财务绩效评估模型，虽然涉及财务风险（如破产风险），但其核心应用领域是企业财务绩效分类，而非特定的金融研究领域如衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理。
